rule: Each description must be crafted to create an impactful AI-generated photo, ensuring the overall effectiveness and visual appeal within a brief, singular paragraph.
input: A peaceful sunrise over a calm lake, the soft hues and gentle reflections creating a visually appealing and serene image within a brief paragraph.
coverage: A peaceful sunrise over a calm lake, featuring soft golden and pink hues of the early morning sky gently reflecting on the still water. The warm, diffused light casts subtle shadows, illuminating the serene surroundings. The background showcases lush trees and a tranquil horizon, enhancing the overall atmosphere. This image evokes a sense of calm and beauty, creating a visually appealing and serene AI-generated photograph.
